com.simsilica.es.base

Interface ComponentHandler<T extends EntityComponent>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MapComponentHandler, SqlComponentHandler

    public interface ComponentHandler<T extends EntityComponent>
    Handles the management of a particular component type or set of component types.
